question: Which of the following extinguishes the liabilities of the Reserve Bank and the guarantee of the central government towards Rs 500 and Rs 1000 notes?
option2: Specified Bank Notes (Cessation of Liabilities) Ordinance, 2016
answer: Specified Bank Notes (Cessation of Liabilities) Ordinance, 2016
explanation: Specified Bank Notes (Cessation of Liabilities) Ordinance, 2016 extinguishes the liabilities of the Reserve Bank and the guarantee of the central government towards Rs 500 and Rs 1000 notes.
